statements: SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_consumption;
SELECT vehicle_id, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM electric_vehicle_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 50;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_consumption WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM electric_vehicle_consumption;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT vehicle_id, energy_consumed FROM electric_vehicle_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = 3
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM electric_vehicle_consumption WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_consumption FROM electric_vehicle_consumption
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT brand, model FROM electric_vehicles WHERE brand='Tesla';
SELECT brand, year, battery_capacity FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE capacity >= 10 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT AVG(usage_per_hour) AS avg_usage FROM charging_stations;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT brand, model, year FROM electric_vehicles WHERE brand = 'Tesla';
SELECT station_id, location FROM charging_stations WHERE usage_per_hour > 5.0;
SELECT brand, model, battery_capacity FROM electric_vehicles WHERE battery_capacity > 500;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY brand ASC, year DESC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_model, energy_consumption FROM electric_vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT station_name, location FROM charging_stations ORDER BY station_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_model, energy_consumption, station_name, location FROM electric_vehicles JOIN charging_stations ON electric_vehicles.vehicle_id = charging_stations.station_id;
SELECT * FROM charging_sessions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM charging_stations
SELECT station_name, location FROM charging_stations WHERE station_id = 1
SELECT vehicle_model, energy_consumption FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_model DESC
SELECT * FROM charging_sessions WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT station_name, COUNT(session_id) AS total_sessions FROM charging_sessions JOIN charging_stations ON charging_sessions.station_id = charging_stations.station_id GROUP BY station_name
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehicles;
SELECT brand, model FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE battery_capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM ChargingStations ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT station_id, location, charging_capacity FROM ChargingStations WHERE charging_capacity >= 100 ORDER BY charging_capacity DESC;
SELECT e.vehicle_id, e.brand, e.model, c.location, e.battery_capacity, c.charging_capacity FROM ElectricVehicles e JOIN ChargingStations c ON e.vehicle_id = c.station_id;
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT brand, model, battery_capacity FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE battery_capacity > 70;
SELECT station_id, location, charging_capacity FROM ChargingStations WHERE charging_capacity >= 50;

SELECT ChargingEvents.event_id, vehicle_id, station_id, timestamp, energy_delivered, brand, model FROM ChargingEvents INNER JOIN ElectricVehicles ON ChargingEvents.vehicle_id = ElectricVehicles.vehicle_id;

SELECT ChargingEvents.event_id, charging_capacity, consumption_amount FROM ChargingEvents INNER JOIN ChargingStations ON ChargingEvents.station_id = ChargingStations.station_id INNER JOIN EnergyConsumption ON ChargingEvents.event_id = EnergyConsumption.event_id WHERE Consumption_amount > 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT brand, model, battery_capacity FROM electric_vehicles WHERE brand='Tesla';
SELECT brand, model, battery_capacity FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY battery_capacity DESC;
SELECT station_id, location, power_rating FROM charging_stations WHERE power_rating >= 50;
SELECT session_id, timestamp, vehicle_id, energy_delivered FROM charging_sessions WHERE energy_delivered <= 100;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY brand ASC, battery_capacity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT brand, model, SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_energy_consumed FROM electric_vehicles GROUP BY brand, model HAVING AVG(battery_capacity) > 50;

SELECT station_id, location, capacity, AVG(power_rating) AS average_power_rating FROM charging_stations WHERE capacity >= 10 GROUP BY station_id, location, capacity ORDER BY average_power_rating DESC;
SELECT session_id, vehicle_id, energy_delivered, timestamp FROM charging_sessions WHERE energy_delivered > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_id, vehicle_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -80 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
